title: Sonic Youth - SYR1- Anagrama (FLAC)
description:
SYR1: Anagrama is an EP by Sonic Youth. It was the first in a series of experimental and mostly instrumental releases put out on the band's own SYR label.

The liner notes for SYR1 were written in the French language which started the tradition of having the liner notes of SYR releases written in foreign languages.
